E

EasyClientSocket - Class in EasyNetworking.library
EasyClientSocket - EasyClientSocket simplifies the creation of client sockets allowing you to easily send data back and forth between a server without the extra hassle
EasyClientSocket() - Constructor for class EasyNetworking.library.EasyClientSocket
This constructor calls the super(); constructor of Socket
EasyClientSocket(String) - Constructor for class EasyNetworking.library.EasyClientSocket
This constructor calls the super(); constructor of Socket and clientName is instantiated (look at clientName documentation)
EasyMultiThreadedServer - Class in EasyNetworking.library
EasyMultiThreadedServer - EasyMultiThreadedServer simplify the creation of multi threaded servers allowing multiple clients connect to a single server
EasyMultiThreadedServer(int) - Constructor for class EasyNetworking.library.EasyMultiThreadedServer
This constructor calls the super(port); constructor of the EasyServerSocket Class and then sets the default timeout and then instantiates the workThreads ArrayList
EasyMultiThreadedServer(int, String) - Constructor for class EasyNetworking.library.EasyMultiThreadedServer
This constructor calls the super(port); constructor of the EasyServerSocket Class and then sets the default timeout and then instantiates the workThreads ArrayList
EasyMultiThreadedServer.WorkerThread - Class in EasyNetworking.library
EasyMultiThreadedServer - EasyMultiThreadedServer.WorkerThread is used to run the Server code independently from the connection program so that multiple clients can connect at the same time
EasyNetworking.library - package EasyNetworking.library
 
EasyNetworking.tests - package EasyNetworking.tests
 
EasyServerSocket - Class in EasyNetworking.library
EasyServerSocket - EasyServerSocket class implements simplified methods for ServerSocket,
EasyServerSocket(int) - Constructor for class EasyNetworking.library.EasyServerSocket
Calls the Constructor in ServerSocket while also setting a default timeout of 10000 milliseconds
EasyServerSocket(int, String) - Constructor for class EasyNetworking.library.EasyServerSocket
Calls the Constructor in ServerSocket while also setting a default timeout of 10000 milliseconds and naming error messages
exampleONE() - Method in class EasyNetworking.tests.Examples.Client
 
exampleONE() - Method in class EasyNetworking.tests.Examples.Server
